languages.text: Благодаря острому уму и немалой удаче Вольному Торговцу удалось отыскать несколько древнеимперских кораблей и восстановить археотечный механизм-компас, указывающий на расположение материнского судна-ковчега — систему Мю-Ро 79.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря острому уму и немалой удаче Вольному Торговцу удалось отыскать несколько древнеимперских кораблей и восстановить археотечный механизм-компас, указывающий на расположение материнского судна-ковчега — систему Мю-Ро 79.

languages.text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.
languages.original_text: Благодаря острому уму и немалой удаче Вольному Торговцу удалось отыскать несколько древнеимперских кораблей и восстановить археотечный механизм-компас, указывающий на расположение материнского судна-ковчега — систему Мю-Ро 79.

traits.locale_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

languages.text: 行商浪人靠着敏锐的智慧与出色的运气，成功地发现了几艘古老的帝国舰船，让远古罗盘重新恢复了运转。罗盘指向了舰队母舰的位置，该位置处于穆罗霍79号星系。
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人靠着敏锐的智慧与出色的运气，成功地发现了几艘古老的帝国舰船，让远古罗盘重新恢复了运转。罗盘指向了舰队母舰的位置，该位置处于穆罗霍79号星系。

languages.text: 鋭い知性と少しばかりとは言い難い幸運のおかげで、自由開拓者は数隻の古代帝国の船を発見し、さらに艦隊の母船であるムー・ロー79星系の位置を示す、技術遺産のコンパス機構を復元することに成功した。
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: 鋭い知性と少しばかりとは言い難い幸運のおかげで、自由開拓者は数隻の古代帝国の船を発見し、さらに艦隊の母船であるムー・ロー79星系の位置を示す、技術遺産のコンパス機構を復元することに成功した。

languages.text: Gracias a su intelecto y a una suerte considerable, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha logrado encontrar varias naves Imperiales antiguas y restaurar la brújula de arqueotecnología que indica el camino a la nave nodriza de la flota: está en el sistema Mu-Ro 79.
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a su intelecto y a una suerte considerable, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha logrado encontrar varias naves Imperiales antiguas y restaurar la brújula de arqueotecnología que indica el camino a la nave nodriza de la flota: está en el sistema Mu-Ro 79.

languages.text: Dank {mf|seines|ihres} scharfen Verstandes und einer ordentlichen Portion Glück konnte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einige alte imperiale Schiffe orten und den Mechanismus des Archäotech-Kompass reparieren, um die Position des Mutterschiffs der Flotte zu bestimmen ... das Mu-Rho-79-System.
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: Dank {mf|seines|ihres} scharfen Verstandes und einer ordentlichen Portion Glück konnte {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einige alte imperiale Schiffe orten und den Mechanismus des Archäotech-Kompass reparieren, um die Position des Mutterschiffs der Flotte zu bestimmen ... das Mu-Rho-79-System.

languages.text: Grâce à sa vivacité intellectuelle et un peu de chance, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} parvint à trouver plusieurs anciens vaisseaux impériaux et à restaurer la boussole archéotechnologique indiquant l'emplacement du vaisseau-mère de la flotte : le système de Mu-Rho 79.
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à sa vivacité intellectuelle et un peu de chance, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} parvint à trouver plusieurs anciens vaisseaux impériaux et à restaurer la boussole archéotechnologique indiquant l'emplacement du vaisseau-mère de la flotte : le système de Mu-Rho 79.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, keskin zekâsının ve bol miktarda da şansın yardımıyla bazı kadim İmparatorluk gemileri keşfetti ve arkeotek pusula mekanizmasını yeniden kurmayı başardı. Pusula, filonun ana gemisinin konumu olan Mu-Ro 79 Sistemi'ni gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: Owing to {mf|his|her} keen intellect and more than a bit of luck, the Rogue Trader managed to discover several ancient Imperial ships and restore the archeotech compass mechanism pointing to the location of the fleet's mother ship — the Mu-Rho 79 System.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir keskin zekâsının ve bol miktarda da şansın yardımıyla bazı kadim İmparatorluk gemileri keşfetti ve arkeotek pusula mekanizmasını yeniden kurmayı başardı. Pusula, filonun ana gemisinin konumunu gösteriyor: Mu-Rho 79 Sistemi.
